newsitem.title: UK: Residential Mortgage Secs sets 64 mln stg FRN.
newsitem.headline: Residential Mortgage Secs sets 64 mln stg FRN.

text.p: Residential Mortgage Securities 1 Plc has issued a three-tranche asset-backed bond for a total of 64.2 million stg, lead manager Nomura said.
CLASS A
AMT 59 MLN STG BASE *3M-LIBOR LEG MAT 09.MAR.34
S&P AAA MARGIN +15 BP AVG LIFE 4.11 YRS
REOFFER 99.90 ISS PRICE PAR PAY DATE 13.DEC.96
FULL FEES 0.40 MGT/UND 0.30 SELLING 0.10
NOTES *TO DECEMBER 2006 THEN 3M-LIBOR +40 BP
CLASS M
AMT 5.2 MLN STG BASE *3M-LIBOR LEG MAT 09.MAR.34
S&P = MARGIN +40 BP AVG LIFE 9.99 YRS
REOFFER 99.28 ISS PRICE PAR PAY DATE 13.DEC.96
FULL FEES 1.47 MGT/UND 0.75 SELLING 0.72
NOTES *TO DECEMBER 2006 THEN 3M-LIBOR +90 BP
THERE IS ALSO A 3.19 MILLION STG CLASS B TRANCHE
COMMON TERMS
LISTING LONDON DENOMS (K) 10 SALE LIMITS US/UK
NEG PLG NO CRS DEFLT NO FORCE MAJ IPMA 2
NOTES CALLABLE ON EVERY COUPON DATE ASSUMING LESS THAN 10
PERCENT OF THE CLASS OUTSTANDING
-- London Newsroom +44 171 542 8863
